Isaiah "J.R." Ridersays UNLV's 'Hey Reb!' statue -- with ties to the Confederacy -- had to be removed ... telling TMZ Sports he's proud his alma mater "did the right thing."
Rider was an absolute be… [+1848 chars]

articles.title: Marcus Rashford was very brave in taking on the UK government - Shaka Hislop | ESPN FC - ESPN UK
